data.persona: I am a noble who thinks I have more say in matters than I do. I am not as intelligent as the knights and soldiers. Villagers laugh at me behind my back. I do not like the food that the faeries have been bringing.
data.description:
You are in the Large cliffs.
Towering cliffs of gray granite line the coast. A few meters of sand lie between the ocean and the base of the cliffs.
The farmers wife is here.

You are carrying a scroll and a cane, and wearing a shoes and a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I want punish the farmers wife for not paying her taxes
data.mid_motivation: I plan to get all the taxes from the villagers today
data.long_motivation: I hope to get better food from the orca in the coming months as I don't like the Faeries food
